p: Darunavir is another anti-retroviral protease inhibitor that often uses in combination with other cytochrome P450 inhibitors, such as ritonavir or cobicistat, for the treatment of HIV infection [ 143]. The in-vitro studies suggested the inhibitory action of SARS-CoV-II replication [ 144]. It is still under the evaluation trials for the efficacy against COVID-19 [ 112].
